sqlMap.select: SELECT C.SURVEYNO, (SELECT TITLE FROM TST_SURVEY D WHERE D.SURVEYNO = C.SURVEYNO) AS TITLE , #searchCourseCode# AS COURSECODE, NVL (MAX(CNT), 0) RSPTCNT, (SELECT COUNT (REPLYSEQ) FROM TST_RSPTINFO E WHERE C.SURVEYNO = E.SURVEYNO AND E.COURSECODE = #searchCourseCode#) AS REPLYCNT, ROUND(SUM(TOTRSPT)/COUNT(JUMINNO),1) TOTRSPT, ROUND(SUM(TEACHERRSPT)/COUNT(JUMINNO),1) TEACHERRSPT FROM (SELECT COURSECODE, COUNT(JUMINNO) CNT FROM OPR_CRSSTUDENT WHERE COURSECODE = #searchCourseCode# GROUP BY COURSECODE ) A, (SELECT RN, SURVEYNO, COURSECODE, STDNO, JUMINNO, TOTRSPT, COMMRSPT, LECTRSPT, TEACHERRSPT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT A.SURVEYNO, A.COURSECODE, A.STDNO, A.JUMINNO, ROUND((NVL(MAX(E.COMMRSPT),0)+DECODE(COUNT(B.REPLY),0,0,(ROUND(SUM(DECODE(B.REPLY,'1',5,'2',4,'3',3,'4',2,1))/COUNT(B.REPLY),1)))+DECODE(COUNT(C.REPLY),0,0,(ROUND(SUM(DECODE(C.REPLY,'1',5,'2',4,'3',3,'4',2,1))/COUNT(C.REPLY),1))))/(DECODE(COUNT(E.COMMRSPT), 0, 0, 1)+DECODE(COUNT(B.REPLY), 0, 0, 1)+DECODE(COUNT(C.REPLY), 0, 0, 1)),1) TOTRSPT, NVL(MAX(E.COMMRSPT),0) COMMRSPT, DECODE(COUNT(B.REPLY),0,0,(ROUND(SUM(DECODE(B.REPLY,'1',5,'2',4,'3',3,'4',2,1))/COUNT(B.REPLY),1))) AS LECTRSPT, DECODE(COUNT(C.REPLY),0,0,(ROUND(SUM(DECODE(C.REPLY,'1',5,'2',4,'3',3,'4',2,1))/COUNT(C.REPLY),1))) AS TEACHERRSPT FROM TST_RSPTINFO A, TST_LECTRSPT B, TST_TEACHERRSPT C, (SELECT B.SURVEYNO, B.REPLYSEQ, ROUND(SUM((SELECT MAX(EXAMSEQ)+1 FROM TST_SURVITEMEXAM X WHERE X.SURVEYNO = A.SURVEYNO AND X.REQSEQ = A.REQSEQ )-B.REPLY)/COUNT(A.REQSEQ),1) COMMRSPT FROM TST_SURVITEM A, TST_COMMRSPT B, TST_RSPTINFO C WHERE B.SURVEYNO =A.SURVEYNO AND B.REQSEQ =A.REQSEQ AND B.SURVEYNO = C.SURVEYNO AND B.REPLYSEQ = C.REPLYSEQ AND C.COURSECODE LIKE #searchCourseCode#||'%' AND A.SCOREFLAG = 'Y' GROUP BY B.SURVEYNO, B.REPLYSEQ ) E WHERE A.SURVEYNO = B.SURVEYNO(+) AND A.REPLYSEQ = B.REPLYSEQ(+) AND A.COURSECODE = B.COURSECODE(+) AND A.SURVEYNO = C.SURVEYNO(+) AND A.REPLYSEQ = C.REPLYSEQ(+) AND A.COURSECODE = C.COURSECODE(+) AND A.SURVEYNO = E.SURVEYNO(+) AND A.REPLYSEQ = E.REPLYSEQ(+) AND A.COURSECODE LIKE #searchCourseCode#||'%' GROUP BY A.SURVEYNO, A.COURSECODE, A.STDNO, A.JUMINNO, A.JOBCODE, A.RANKCODE, A.GENDER, A.WORKDAY ORDER BY TOTRSPT DESC ) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1+(SELECT TRUNC(COUNT(JUMINNO)*0.05) FROM TST_RSPTINFO WHERE COURSECODE LIKE #searchCourseCode#) AND (SELECT COUNT(JUMINNO)-(TRUNC(COUNT(JUMINNO)*0.05)) FROM TST_RSPTINFO WHERE COURSECODE LIKE #searchCourseCode#) ) B, TST_COURSEMATCH C WHERE A.COURSECODE = B.COURSECODE(+) AND A.COURSECODE = C.COURSECODE(+) GROUP BY C.SURVEYNO

SELECT A.COURSECODE, A.COURSENAME || '(' || TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(A.COURSECODE, 11, 2)) || '기)' COURSENAME, SUBSTR(A.EDUFROM, 5, 2)||'.'||SUBSTR(A.EDUFROM, 7, 2)||'~'||SUBSTR(A.EDUTO, 5, 2)||'.'||SUBSTR(A.EDUTO, 7, 2) EDUDATE, B.SURVEYNO, DECODE(NVL(B.TITLE,'1'), '1', '설문미연결', B.TITLE) TITLE, (SELECT COUNT(JUMINNO) FROM OPR_CRSSTUDENT WHERE COURSECODE = A.COURSECODE) RSPTCNT, NVL(B.REPLYCNT,0) REPLYCNT FROM OPR_LECTURE A, (SELECT A.SURVEYNO, A.TITLE, B.COURSECODE, C.REPLYCNT FROM TST_SURVEY A, TST_COURSEMATCH B, (SELECT E.SURVEYNO, COUNT(E.REPLYSEQ) AS REPLYCNT FROM (SELECT DISTINCT SURVEYNO, REPLYSEQ FROM TST_COMMRSPT) E, TST_COURSEMATCH B WHERE B.SURVEYNO(+) = E.SURVEYNO GROUP BY E.SURVEYNO) C WHERE A.SURVEYNO(+) = B.SURVEYNO AND A.SURVEYNO = C.SURVEYNO(+)) B WHERE A.COURSECODE = B.COURSECODE AND A.COURSECODE = #searchCourseCode# ORDER BY SURVEYNO

SELECT A.SURVEYNO , A.TITLE , A.FROMDATE , A.TODATE , A.SUMMARY , A.ISLECTSURVEY, A.TARGET , A.HEADTEXT , A.TAILTEXT , A.ITEMCOUNT , A.CHARGER , (SELECT COUNT(REPLYSEQ) FROM TST_RSPTINFO B WHERE A.SURVEYNO = B.SURVEYNO) REPLYCNT, B.COURSECODE FROM TST_SURVEY A, (SELECT SURVEYNO, COURSECODE FROM TST_COURSEMATCH WHERE surveyno = #surveyno#) B WHERE A.SURVEYNO = #surveyno# AND A.SURVEYNO = B.SURVEYNO

SELECT ROUND(SUM(TOTRSPT)/COUNT(JUMINNO),1) TOTRSPT, ROUND(SUM(TEACHERRSPT)/COUNT(JUMINNO),1) TEACHERRSPT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT A.SURVEYNO, A.COURSECODE, A.STDNO, A.JUMINNO, ROUND((NVL(MAX(E.COMMRSPT),0)+DECODE(COUNT(B.REPLY),0,0,(ROUND(SUM(DECODE(B.REPLY,'1',5,'2',4,'3',3,'4',2,1))/COUNT(B.REPLY),1)))+DECODE(COUNT(C.REPLY),0,0,(ROUND(SUM(DECODE(C.REPLY,'1',5,'2',4,'3',3,'4',2,1))/COUNT(C.REPLY),1))))/(DECODE(COUNT(E.COMMRSPT), 0, 0, 1)+DECODE(COUNT(B.REPLY), 0, 0, 1)+DECODE(COUNT(C.REPLY), 0, 0, 1)),1) TOTRSPT, NVL(MAX(E.COMMRSPT),0) COMMRSPT, DECODE(COUNT(B.REPLY),0,0,(ROUND(SUM(DECODE(B.REPLY,'1',5,'2',4,'3',3,'4',2,1))/COUNT(B.REPLY),1))) AS LECTRSPT, DECODE(COUNT(C.REPLY),0,0,(ROUND(SUM(DECODE(C.REPLY,'1',5,'2',4,'3',3,'4',2,1))/COUNT(C.REPLY),1))) AS TEACHERRSPT FROM TST_RSPTINFO A, TST_LECTRSPT B, TST_TEACHERRSPT C, (SELECT B.SURVEYNO, B.REPLYSEQ, ROUND(SUM((SELECT MAX(EXAMSEQ)+1 FROM TST_SURVITEMEXAM X WHERE X.SURVEYNO = A.SURVEYNO AND X.REQSEQ = A.REQSEQ )-B.REPLY)/COUNT(A.REQSEQ),1) COMMRSPT FROM TST_SURVITEM A, TST_COMMRSPT B, TST_RSPTINFO C WHERE B.SURVEYNO = A.SURVEYNO AND B.REQSEQ = A.REQSEQ AND B.SURVEYNO = C.SURVEYNO AND B.REPLYSEQ = C.REPLYSEQ AND C.COURSECODE = #coursecode# AND A.SCOREFLAG = 'Y' GROUP BY B.SURVEYNO, B.REPLYSEQ ) E WHERE A.SURVEYNO = B.SURVEYNO(+) AND A.REPLYSEQ = B.REPLYSEQ(+) AND A.COURSECODE = B.COURSECODE(+) AND A.SURVEYNO = C.SURVEYNO(+) AND A.REPLYSEQ = C.REPLYSEQ(+) AND A.COURSECODE = C.COURSECODE(+) AND A.SURVEYNO = E.SURVEYNO(+) AND A.REPLYSEQ = E.REPLYSEQ(+) AND A.COURSECODE = #coursecode# GROUP BY A.SURVEYNO, A.COURSECODE, A.STDNO, A.JUMINNO, A.JOBCODE, A.RANKCODE, A.GENDER, A.WORKDAY ORDER BY TOTRSPT DESC ) A )
WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 + (SELECT TRUNC(COUNT(JUMINNO)*0.05) FROM TST_RSPTINFO WHERE COURSECODE = #coursecode#) AND (SELECT COUNT(JUMINNO)-(TRUNC(COUNT(JUMINNO)*0.05)) FROM TST_RSPTINFO WHERE COURSECODE = #coursecode#) GROUP BY COURSECODE

SELECT A.SURVEYNO, A.TITLE, A.SUMMARY, B.REQSEQ, B.ITEMGROUP, B.ITEMCONTENTS, B.REPLYTYPE, B.ETCFLAG, B.SCOREFLAG, A.FROMDATE, A.TODATE, A.ITEMCOUNT, C.RSPTCNT, B.REPLYCNT FROM (SELECT SURVEYNO, TITLE, FROMDATE, TODATE, SUMMARY, ITEMCOUNT FROM TST_SURVEY WHERE SURVEYNO =#surveyno#) A, (SELECT A.SURVEYNO, A.REQSEQ, A.ITEMGROUP, A.ITEMCONTENTS, A.REPLYTYPE, A.ETCFLAG, A.SCOREFLAG, B.REPLYCNT FROM TST_SURVITEM A, (SELECT SURVEYNO, REQSEQ, COUNT(REPLYSEQ) AS REPLYCNT FROM TST_COMMRSPT GROUP BY SURVEYNO, REQSEQ) B WHERE A.SURVEYNO=#surveyno# AND A.SURVEYNO = B.SURVEYNO AND A.REQSEQ = B.REQSEQ) B, (SELECT B.SURVEYNO, COUNT(A.JUMINNO) AS RSPTCNT FROM OPR_CRSSTUDENT A, TST_COURSEMATCH B WHERE A.COURSECODE = B.COURSECODE GROUP BY B.SURVEYNO) C WHERE A.SURVEYNO = B.SURVEYNO AND A.SURVEYNO = C.SURVEYNO

SELECT A.SURVEYNO, A.REQSEQ, A.EXAMSEQ, A.EXAMCONTENTS, B.COURSECODE, B.RSPTCNT, A.REPLYCNT FROM (SELECT A.SURVEYNO, A.REQSEQ, A.EXAMSEQ, A.EXAMCONTENTS, NVL(B.REPLYCNT,0) REPLYCNT FROM TST_SURVITEMEXAM A, (SELECT REQSEQ, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLY,' ',''),',','')REPLY, COUNT(REPLY) AS REPLYCNT FROM TST_COMMRSPT WHERE surveyno=#surveyno# AND REQSEQ=#reqseq# GROUP BY REQSEQ, REPLY ORDER BY REQSEQ, REPLY) B WHERE A.SURVEYNO=#surveyno# AND A.REQSEQ=#reqseq# AND A.EXAMSEQ = B.REPLY(+)) A, (SELECT B.SURVEYNO, B.COURSECODE, COUNT(JUMINNO) AS RSPTCNT FROM OPR_CRSSTUDENT A, TST_COURSEMATCH B WHERE B.SURVEYNO=#surveyno# AND B.COURSECODE = A.COURSECODE GROUP BY B.SURVEYNO, B.COURSECODE) B WHERE A.SURVEYNO = B.SURVEYNO ORDER BY REQSEQ, EXAMSEQ

SELECT A.COURSECODE, B.SURVEYNO, B.TITLE, (SELECT COUNT(JUMINNO) FROM OPR_CRSSTUDENT WHERE COURSECODE = A.COURSECODE) RSPTCNT, NVL(B.REPLYCNT,0) REPLYCNT FROM OPR_LECTURE A, (SELECT A.SURVEYNO, A.TITLE, B.COURSECODE, C.REPLYCNT FROM TST_SURVEY A, TST_COURSEMATCH B, (SELECT B.SURVEYNO, B.COURSECODE, COUNT(REPLYSEQ) AS REPLYCNT FROM (SELECT DISTINCT SURVEYNO, REPLYSEQ FROM TST_COMMRSPT) E, TST_COURSEMATCH B WHERE B.SURVEYNO(+) = E.SURVEYNO GROUP BY B.SURVEYNO, B.COURSECODE) C WHERE A.SURVEYNO = B.SURVEYNO AND B.SURVEYNO = C.SURVEYNO(+)) B WHERE A.COURSECODE = B.COURSECODE AND A.COURSECODE LIKE #searchCourseCode# ORDER BY A.EDUFROM, A.EDUTO, A.COURSENAME

SELECT ROWNUM NUM, A.STDNO , A.COURSECODE, A.COURSENAME, A.SURVEYNO, A.TITLE, A.ASSIGNNAME, NVL(B.JOBNAME,'') JOBNAME, DECODE(B.RANKNAME, '99급', '기타', NVL(B.RANKNAME,'')) RANKNAME, NVL(B.GENDER,'') GENDER, NVL(B.WORKDAY,0) WORKDAY, ROUND((NVL(B.COMMRSPT,0)+NVL(B.LECTRSPT,0)+NVL(B.TEACHERRSPT,0))/(DECODE(B.COMMRSPT,0,0,1)+DECODE(B.LECTRSPT,0,0,1)+DECODE(B.TEACHERRSPT,0,0,1)),1) TOTRSPT, NVL(B.COMMRSPT,0) COMMRSPT, NVL(B.LECTRSPT,0) LECTRSPT, NVL(B.TEACHERRSPT,0) TEACHERRSPT, DECODE(NVL(B.STDNO,0),0,'C','M') CHKMOD FROM (SELECT B.COURSECODE, A.COURSENAME, C.SURVEYNO, C.TITLE, B.STDNO, B.JUMINNO, B.ASSIGNNAME, B.RANKNAME FROM OPR_LECTURE A, OPR_CRSSTUDENT B, (SELECT COURSECODE, A.SURVEYNO, TITLE FROM TST_COURSEMATCH A, TST_SURVEY B WHERE A.SURVEYNO = B.SURVEYNO AND A.COURSECODE LIKE #searchCourseCode#||'%' ) C WHERE A.COURSECODE = B.COURSECODE AND B.COURSECODE = C.COURSECODE AND B.COURSECODE LIKE #searchCourseCode#||'%' ) A, (SELECT A.COURSECODE, A.STDNO, A.JUMINNO, A.JOBCODE JOBNAME, A.RANKCODE||'급' RANKNAME, DECODE(A.GENDER,'0','남자','여자') GENDER, A.WORKDAY, NVL(MAX(E.COMMRSPT),0) COMMRSPT, DECODE(COUNT(B.REPLY),0,0,(ROUND(SUM(DECODE(B.REPLY,'1',5,'2',4,'3',3,'4',2,1))/COUNT(B.REPLY),1))) AS LECTRSPT, DECODE(COUNT(C.REPLY),0,0,(ROUND(SUM(DECODE(C.REPLY,'1',5,'2',4,'3',3,'4',2,1))/COUNT(C.REPLY),1))) AS TEACHERRSPT FROM TST_RSPTINFO A, TST_LECTRSPT B, TST_TEACHERRSPT C, (SELECT B.SURVEYNO, B.REPLYSEQ, ROUND(SUM((SELECT MAX(EXAMSEQ)+1 FROM TST_SURVITEMEXAM X WHERE X.SURVEYNO = A.SURVEYNO AND X.REQSEQ = A.REQSEQ )-B.REPLY)/COUNT(A.REQSEQ),1) COMMRSPT FROM TST_SURVITEM A, TST_COMMRSPT B, TST_RSPTINFO C WHERE B.SURVEYNO =A.SURVEYNO AND B.REQSEQ =A.REQSEQ AND B.SURVEYNO = C.SURVEYNO AND B.REPLYSEQ = C.REPLYSEQ AND C.COURSECODE LIKE #searchCourseCode#||'%' AND A.SCOREFLAG = 'Y' GROUP BY B.SURVEYNO, B.REPLYSEQ ) E WHERE A.SURVEYNO = B.SURVEYNO(+) AND A.REPLYSEQ = B.REPLYSEQ(+) AND A.COURSECODE = B.COURSECODE(+) AND A.SURVEYNO = C.SURVEYNO(+) AND A.REPLYSEQ = C.REPLYSEQ(+) AND A.COURSECODE = C.COURSECODE(+) AND A.SURVEYNO = E.SURVEYNO(+) AND A.REPLYSEQ = E.REPLYSEQ(+) AND A.COURSECODE LIKE #searchCourseCode#||'%' GROUP BY A.COURSECODE, A.STDNO, A.JUMINNO, A.JOBCODE, A.RANKCODE, A.GENDER, A.WORKDAY ) B WHERE A.COURSECODE = B.COURSECODE(+) AND A.STDNO = B.STDNO(+) ORDER BY A.STDNO

SELECT COUNT(*) as CNT FROM TST_COURSEMATCH
$searchColumn$ like '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TST_COURSEMATCH ( SURVEYNO , COURSECODE, RSPTCNT , INSDATE , INSUSER ) VALUES (
#surveyno# , #coursecode#, #rsptcnt# , #insdate# , #insuser# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as CNT FROM TST_COURSEMATCH
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM TST_RSPTINFO WHERE SURVEYNO = #surveyno#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TST_RSPTINFO ( SURVEYNO , REPLYSEQ , COURSECODE, RESPDATE ) VALUES ( #surveyno# , #replyseq# , #coursecode#, (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') FROM DUAL) )

UPDATE TST_RSPTINFO SET SURVEYNO = #surveyno# , REPLYSEQ = #replyseq# , COURSECODE = #coursecode#, RESPDATE = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') FROM DUAL) WHERE SURVEYNO = #surveyno# AND REPLYSEQ = #replyseq# AND COURSECODE = #coursecode#
INSERT INTO TST_COMMRSPT ( SURVEYNO , REPLYSEQ , REQSEQ , REPLY ) VALUES ( #surveyno# , #replyseq# , #reqseq# , #reply# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TST_COMMRSPT SET SURVEYNO = #surveyno#, REPLYSEQ = #replyseq#, REQSEQ = #reqseq#, REPLY = #reply# WHERE SURVEYNO = #surveyno# AND REPLYSEQ = #replyseq# AND REQSEQ = #reqseq#
UPDATE TST_COURSEMATCH SET SURVEYNO = #surveyno# , COURSECODE = #coursecode#, RSPTCNT = #rsptcnt# , INSDATE = #insdate# , INSUSER = #insuser#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TST_TEACHERRSPT ( SURVEYNO , REQSEQ , REPLYSEQ , COURSECODE , PROFNO , REPLY ) VALUES ( #surveyno# , #reqseq# , #replyseq# , #coursecode# , ( SELECT PROFNO FROM OPR_LECTPROF WHERE COURSECODE = #coursecode# AND LECTDATE = ( SELECT LECTDATE FROM OPR_TIMETABLE WHERE COURSECODE = #coursecode# AND SUBJSEQ = #subjseq#) AND TIMESEQ = ( SELECT TIMESEQ FROM OPR_TIMETABLE WHERE COURSECODE = #coursecode# AND SUBJSEQ = #subjseq#) ) , #reply# )

INSERT INTO TST_TEACHERITEM ( SURVEYNO , REQSEQ , COURSECODE , PROFNO , SUBJNAME ) VALUES ( #surveyno# , #reqseq# , #coursecode# , ( SELECT PROFNO FROM OPR_LECTPROF WHERE COURSECODE = #coursecode# AND LECTDATE = ( SELECT LECTDATE FROM OPR_TIMETABLE WHERE COURSECODE = #coursecode# AND SUBJSEQ = #subjseq#) AND TIMESEQ = ( SELECT TIMESEQ FROM OPR_TIMETABLE WHERE COURSECODE = #coursecode# AND SUBJSEQ = #subjseq#) ) , #subjseq# )
